name: Rival Gangs
description:
Rival Gangs is a top-down, open world sandbox game for the ZX Spectrum 128K, taking influence from the original GTA games.

Please note: an emulator (e.g. Spectaculator, Fuse, ZXSpin etc) or original hardware is required to play this game.

Update - 24 DEC 2021 - original version (211220) contains a fatal bug, which will really spoil your fun if triggered. Please download the latest version (211224)! Apologies and thanks :)
